topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540a9bdc6368725779db0000#post_540a9bdc6368725779db0000
amazing
i love the game

i struggled a lot
but that was mostly me

great action, great controls, great characters, great writing
i loved it

of the Platinum games i still like Wonderful 101 more, but they clearly different games

i am super duper excited for bayonetta

topics.body:

I'm glad you had fun.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
though i'll be honest
i didn't do much in terms of combos and weapons
i honestly used the spear/whip thing for 90% of the game
it was kind of op
huge range in all directions, and just pressing y over and over again, and all human enemies were very easily staggered by it

I did a run where I limited my use of my HF Blade to zandatsuing only and that  staff was my best friend.

topics.body: anyone using chrome and experiencing slow loading tabs or maximizing and minimizing freezes you have two options. either downgrade or delete all your bookmarks. just wanted to get that out

topics.body:
now i need to decide what game to play through next
ugh
so many
i have deadspace 1 and 2, and i should play it
but i'm not very good at 3rd person shooters
i keep getting disorientated by the perspective
and generally the controls always feel weird to me
